mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( USERID, USERNAME, USERPASSWD, PHONENUMBER, ZIP, BIRTHDAY, ADDR1, ADDR2, PASSWDQ, PASSWDA, EMAIL, AUTHORITY ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPasswd}, #{phoneNumber}, #{zip}, #{birthday}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{passwdQ}, #{passwdA}, #{email}, #{authority} )
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, USERNAME, USERPASSWD, PHONENUMBER, ZIP, BIRTHDAY, ADDR1, ADDR2, PASSWDQ, PASSWDA, EMAIL, AUTHORITY FROM member WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND USERPASSWD = #{userPasswd}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET USERPASSWD = #{userPasswd}, PHONENUMBER = #{phoneNumber}, ZIP = #{zip}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, ADDR1 = #{addr1}, ADDR2 = #{addr2}, PASSWDQ = #{passwdQ}, PASSWDA = #{passwdA}, EMAIL = #{email} WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND USERNAME = #{userName}
mapper.select: select userId from member where EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set USERPASSWD = #{userPasswd} where USERID = #{userId}
